title: Secret Agent maps
content:
I've updated my [url=http://www.student.tue.nl/u/a.f.smeijers/sfp]Secret Agent page[/url].Groeten van Frenkel
Visit [url=http://www.sfprod.cjb.net]The Official S&F Prod. Homepage[/url]

title: Re: Secret Agent maps
content:
Oh! Oh! Secret mission. Hmm... is it anything that can be downloaded?

Anyway, I know what it is, and must say 'good work' to Frenkel for it. [img]http://www.classicgaming.com/cc314/msgboard/emotikeen-wink.gif[/img] [url=http://spikenexus.toxicsheep.com/pccw/][img]http://spikenexus.toxicsheep.com/pccw/imgs/links/pccwsml.gif[/img][/url]

title: hehe
content:
Wow, I remember these levels being a lot larger than they actually are. :-)

I think SAM is one of the few games that had teleporters I was excited to use. Most games with teleporters are kinda twitchy to me... probably had to do with the cool teleport noise SAM made.

title: Re: hehe
content:
Frenkel, did the maps take you very long to make?

When I was creating the Crystal Caves map images from my Crystal Caves website, I had to make so many adjustments - monsters moving around too much, random items appearing, switches being moved, and the like. Not easy for someone with little patience and a bad mouse...

Anyway, it's interesting to see the entire levels in a single shot. Like Xky said, I alway imaginged the levels were bigger than they actually are. Well, now I know. Good job, again.[url=http://spikenexus.toxicsheep.com/pccw/][img]http://spikenexus.toxicsheep.com/pccw/imgs/links/pccwsml.gif[/img][/url]

title: Re: hehe
content:
Maybe they feel bigger because the character is small and can't jump very long or high. [img]http://www.classicgaming.com/cc314/msgboard/emotikeen-smile.gif[/img]
Good stuff!You hear in your mind: GAAARRRRRGG!

title: Re: hehe
content:
I created a Qbasic program that showed a level on screen. But it wasn't perfect, so I had to make the levels perfect by hand and that took a while.

I didn't knew all the levels had the same height and width until I made this program.Groeten van Frenkel
Visit [url=http://www.sfprod.cjb.net]The Official S&F Prod. Homepage[/url]

title: Re: hehe
content: Yeah, that's surprising. (Although I had noticed it before.) Same goes with Crystal Caves, too.You hear in your mind: GAAARRRRRGG!

title: oh
content: Oh, hey, I've been meaning to ask... on SAM2, level 12.  Is there any way to spell SPY in that level?  I can't seem to avoid grabbing the P first, because I need the barrell to reach the S.  :-(  And SAM3, level 3, I can't get the red key without hitting the P, too.
